title: Me, My Husband & My Husband's Boyfriend
overview: "I want to be loved, as a person, and as a woman." Misaki Nakamichi is a teacher who has been married for 5 years to her attractive husband Yuuki Nakamichi. She appears to have a life that many would be envious of. However, the relationship suffers from a lack of physical intimacy. Her husband only sleeps with her once a year, on the day of their wedding anniversary. As she continues to question her husband's sexual desire for her, their next anniversary arrives... and she is shocked to see him kissing a man. And not just any man, but Shyuuhei Ina, one of her students!
